cause.description:
IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE, GO TO WWW.TUMORNATORS.COM! DO NOT DONATE HERE The company that runs this application will deduct 4.5% from any donation. This "Cause" is really just another way to spread the word, so thanks for your support!
Schwannomatosis is a devastating disorder affecting 1 in 40,000 individuals. It has only recently been diagnosed, so little is known about its causes and treatments. We are funding a research effort with The Children's Tumor Foundation to try and cure this excruciatingly painful disorder. To get the full story go to www.tumornators.com & www.ctf.org .
1. We believe the cure is out there...and we will find it.
cause.mission: To raise money for The Children's Tumor Foundation to research Schwannomatosis, and to raise awareness for the debilitating disorder.
cause.name: The Tumornators
